meanings.definition: A person who is confined in jail.
meanings.sent1: The jailbirds sat quietly in their cells.
meanings.sent2: The jailbirds were visited by their families on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The jailbirds joked about starting a book club in prison.
meanings.sent4: The jailbirds' dreams soared beyond the prison walls.
meanings.sent5: The image of the jailbirds behind bars was haunting.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are incarcerated.
meanings.sent1: The jailbirds shared stories of their past lives.
meanings.sent2: The jailbirds formed a bond during their time in prison.
meanings.sent3: The jailbirds organized a talent show behind bars.
meanings.sent4: The jailbirds' unity was unbreakable within the prison walls.
meanings.sent5: The jailbirds' laughter echoed through the cell block.
